scrap-fortress.title: Scrap Fortress
scrap-fortress.content: A makeshift citadel built from airplane wings and shipping containers. It stands as a bastion of order in the lawless wastes.
scrap-fortress.lore: A makeshift citadel built from airplane wings and shipping containers. It stands as a bastion of order in the lawless wastes.

scavenger-jax.title: Scavenger Jax
scavenger-jax.content:
A seasoned survivalist who knows every inch of the Deadlands. Jax can find water in a stone and scrap in a graveyard.

Jax is leading the search for a solution to [[The Great Drought]].
scavenger-jax.lore:
A seasoned survivalist who knows every inch of the Deadlands. Jax can find water in a stone and scrap in a graveyard.

Jax is leading the search for a solution to [[The Great Drought]].

mama-rust.title: Mama Rust
mama-rust.content: An elderly mechanic who can fix anything with a piece of wire and a hammer. She maintains the fortress's generator.
mama-rust.lore: An elderly mechanic who can fix anything with a piece of wire and a hammer. She maintains the fortress's generator.

dust-raiders.title: The Dust-Raiders
dust-raiders.content: A brutal gang of scavengers who prey on the weak. They value strength and gasoline above all else.
dust-raiders.lore: A brutal gang of scavengers who prey on the weak. They value strength and gasoline above all else.

sand-stinger.title: Sand Stinger
sand-stinger.content: A house-sized scorpion with a glowing green stinger. Its venom is highly prized but extremely difficult to extract.
sand-stinger.lore: A house-sized scorpion with a glowing green stinger. Its venom is highly prized but extremely difficult to extract.

hidden-vault-map.title: Map to the Hidden Vault
hidden-vault-map.content: A tattered piece of leather with hand-drawn landmarks leading to a legendary pre-war bunker filled with supplies.
hidden-vault-map.lore: A tattered piece of leather with hand-drawn landmarks leading to a legendary pre-war bunker filled with supplies.

the-great-drought.title: The Great Drought
the-great-drought.content: A catastrophic lack of rainfall that has lasted for three years, drying up the last remaining oases in the sector.
the-great-drought.lore: A catastrophic lack of rainfall that has lasted for three years, drying up the last remaining oases in the sector.
